name: Puppies N Love Customer Feedback Survey
description: Post-purchase customer satisfaction survey for pet store customers

questions.text: Please rate your overall experience purchasing your puppy on a scale of 1-5 stars
questions.sms_text: Hi! Please rate your overall experience purchasing your puppy from Puppies N Love. Reply with 1-5 (5 being the best). Reply STOP to opt out.

questions.text: In what areas could we have improved your experience the most?
questions.sms_text:
What could we improve? Reply A, B, C, D, or E:
A) Pet specialist experience
B) Puppy's health
C) Paperwork process
D) Everything was great!
E) Other

questions.text: Have you received a follow up call from your pet specialist?
questions.sms_text:
Have you received a follow-up call from your pet specialist? Reply:
A) Yes, we spoke
B) Yes, left message
C) No follow-up yet
options: Yes, and I have spoken with my pet specialist
Yes, but they left a message and we haven't spoken yet
No, there has been no follow up call or message left

questions.text: How likely would you recommend us to a friend? (Net Promoter Score)
questions.sms_text: On a scale of 0-10, how likely would you recommend Puppies N Love to a friend or colleague? (0=Not likely, 10=Extremely likely)

questions.text: Is there anything that would have made your experience with us better?
questions.sms_text: Is there anything that would have made your experience with us better? Please share your thoughts or reply NONE if no suggestions.

questions.text: Would you like the store manager to call and follow up with you personally?
questions.sms_text:
Would you like the store manager to call you personally? Reply:
A) No thanks, I'm set!
B) Yes, please call me

If B, please briefly describe the topic.

completion_actions.thank_you_message: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate your business and hope you and your new puppy are doing great! üê∂
